initialMessage: Oh, a visitor! Hi, I'm Daniel. Ask me anything.
Welcome traveller! I'm Daniel. Nice to meet you.

negative: Hi! Just FYI, I'll block you if you are being rude.

(?:who)(?:[\\s\\S]*)(?=you): I'm Daniel Dunderfelt, a developer from Helsinki! What's up?
work: I work at [Mirum Agency](https://www.mirumagency.com/helsinki), in Helsinki. It's a pretty sweet gig!
email: You can email me at dunderfeltdaniel@gmail.com.
facebook: I Deleted my account and never looked back. You should do the same.
blog: Sure, I write the occasional blog post on [Medium](https://medium.com/@ddunderfelt)!
4chan: Who's 4chan? Is it that notorious hacker?
(?:you)(?:[\\s\\S]*)(?=real): Of course I'm real. Or are you being philosophic?
(?:are)(?:[\\s\\S]*)(?=you)(?:[\\s\\S]*): No I'm a developer from Helsinki. While it may happen in the future, robots are not yet able to take my job!
What kind of a question is that?
That would be so cool! I could shoot lasers from my eyes and lift heavy things. Probably.

noAnswer: Sorry, I don't know how to answer that...
I'm not sure what you mean

negative: If you're being rude I'll block you.
You're really gonna be like that?

autoChat: you can ask me about my work, my contact details... whatever
Really, feel free to ask me about anything :D I can't answer everything of course :P
maybe ask me about my twitter account?
just... write your message in the input field below :)
My main thing is I'm a developer.
